content: मः {@--1@} Time. {@--2@} Poison. {@--3@} A magical formula. {@--4@} The moon. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Brahman. {@--6@} Of Viṣṇu. {@--7@} Of Śiva. {@--8@} Of Yama. {@--9@} (In prosody) A syllabic foot (गण) consisting of three long syllables. {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of the fifth (मध्यम) note in music. --मं {@--1@} Water. {@--2@} Happiness, welfare.
